/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC -O2 -g -DNDEBUG -shared -Wl,-soname,libersapSegmentor.so -o libersapSegmentor.so CMakeFiles/ersapSegmentor.dir/src/segmentor_actor.cpp.o   -L/home/ubuntu/e2sar-install/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu  -Wl,-rpath,/home/ubuntu/e2sar-install/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu:/home/ubuntu/ersap-install/lib:/usr/local/lib: /home/ubuntu/ersap-install/lib/libersap.so /home/ubuntu/ersap-install/lib/libxmsg.so /usr/local/lib/libprotobuf.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libzmq.so
